sentences.simplifiedText: 这栋大厦的结构很坚固。
sentences.traditionalText: 這棟大廈的結構很堅固。
sentences.pinyin: Zhè dòng dàshà de jiégòu hěn jiāngù.
sentences.translation: The structure of this building is very solid.

sentences.simplifiedText: 在设计大楼时，建筑师必须考虑到结构的稳定性和安全性。
sentences.traditionalText: 在設計大樓時，建築師必須考慮到結構的穩定性和安全性。
sentences.pinyin: Zài shèjì dàlóu shí, jiànzhùshī bìxū kǎolǜ dào jiégòu de wěndìng xìng hé ānquán xìng.
sentences.translation: When designing a building, architects have to take into account the stability and safety of the structure.

sentences.pinyin: Zhè shì wǒ de huàzhuāng pǐn.

sentences.simplifiedText: 为了参加晚会，她特意去商店买了新的化妆品。
sentences.traditionalText: 為了參加晚會，她特意去商店買了新的化妝品。
sentences.pinyin: Wèile cānjiā wǎnhuì, tā tèyì qù shāngdiàn mǎile xīn de huàzhuāng pǐn.
sentences.translation: In order to attend the party, she specifically went to the store to buy new makeup.
